content.question: At time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> an object is thrown vertically upward. It then returns to its initial position at <math alttext="t equals t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>. What is the speed of the object at <math alttext="t equals two thirds times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="one sixth g, times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="one fourth g, times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="two thirds g, times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>
<math alttext="seven sixths g, times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one sixth g, times t sub f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>6</mn></mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
